content: कृत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कृ-क्विप्] (Generally at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Accomplisher, doer, maker, performer, manufacturer, composer &c.; पाप°, पुण्य°, प्रतिमा° &c. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A class of affixes used to form derivatives (nouns, adjectives &c.) from roots. {@--2@} A word so formed.

कृत् {vI.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (कृंतति-कृत्त) To cut, cut off, divide, tear asunder, cut in pieces, destroy; प्रहरति विधिर्मर्मच्छेदी न कृंतति जीवितं <ls>U. 3. 31</ls>, <ls n="U. 3.">35</ls>; <ls>Bk. 9. 42</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 97</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">16. 15</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 12.</ls> {vII.v} {c7c} <ab>P.</ab> (कृणत्ति, कृत्त) {@--1@} To spin. {@--2@} To surround, encompass. {@--3@} To attire.
